name: Our 13-Year-Old Son Was Taken by ICE — Help Bring Him Back
description: A 13-Year-Old Son Was Taken by ICE in Everett, MA even though the police were preparing to release him safely to his mother. Instead, ICE arrived unexpectedly and transferred him more than 500 miles away to Virginia, separating him from his family — including his little brother, who keeps asking when his big brother will come home.
